knimeNode.name: Profile Converter
knimeNode.shortDescription: Node to extract profile information from Profile data cells. All profile details are converted into a table matrix, where all Profile data cells are shown in succession.

fullDescription.intro: Extracts profile information from every Profile data cell and converts it into tabular format. The following values are extracted: id, rt, rt width, m/z, intensity, std. deviation, and area.
fullDescription.option: The profile id to be extracted. If a profile from a spectrum container is chosen, all profiles in that spectrum are extracted. If left blank, all profiles are extracted.

ports.inPort: Table containing Profile or Spectrum Data.
